alert.note: Alert for Yavapai (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 3:28PM MST until July 29 at 4:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Yavapai County in west central Arizona... * Until 400 PM MST. * At 326 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Yavapai County Fairgrounds, or 7 miles east of Prescott Valley, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of Yavapai County. This includes State Route 89A between mile markers 330 and 334. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
